title: List All Peers
description: Returns all peers known by the Node. These are not necessarily all peers; only public Nodes appear here.

page.description: The number of the page that will be returned.

limit.description: The number of resources per page.

orderBy.description: The column by which the resources will be sorted.

port.description: The port by which the resources will be filtered.

status.description: The status by which the resources will be filtered.

os.description: The operating system by which the resources will be filtered.

version.description: The node version by which the resources will be filtered.
